text: Gas prices continue to rise with the average costs in my district creeping towards $5/gallon! President Biden needs to reverse his disastrous energy policies & call on Speaker Pelosi to allow a vote on H.R. 6858, which I co-introduced to help restore American energy independence. https://t.co/7VwlB2KbCj

On this date 78 years ago, the tides of battle turned when troops landed on the beaches of Normandy to free Europe from Axis occupation. I am honored to serve so many veterans from the Greatest Generation who call my district home. We owe you a debt we can never repay. #DDAY78 https://t.co/NQ9US8maFk

June is Alzheimer's & Brain Awareness Month. I continue to advocate for research funding which has a direct impact on those suffering from Alzheimer's disease & am dedicated to protecting critical research funding used to contribute to curing this life-threatening illness. https://t.co/AMKOGIiQ2G

This month is #PTSDAwarenessMonth. Many of the veterans I serve carry invisible wounds sustained in action. Last year I supported the PAWS for Veterans Therapy Act in becoming law which expands treatment to veterans with PTSD & secures healing care that service animals provide. https://t.co/bws0thOSsx

It was an honor to recognize 38 Korean War veterans from my district for their contribution to preserving our nationâ€™s freedoms. Our freedom came at the highest cost to these veterans and their families. We owe you a debt we can never repay.

https://t.co/KvswPFUlTE

Small businesses, the backbone of our economy, continue to struggle in Biden's America. The cost of basic goods has skyrocketed, causing businesses to struggle to keep doors open. At what point will President Biden realize his policies aren't working? https://t.co/bdo1FuTrul
I joined Republicans in calling on President Biden to withdraw from @WHO. I am committed to holding the Administration accountable for wasting taxpayer dollars. https://t.co/7TlUuRYFzo

Today is the first day of the 2022 Hurricane Season in Florida. As Floridians, we are familiar with the damage that hurricanes and tropical storms can bring. It is important to begin preparing an emergency supplies kit. Use the @FLSERT checklist to develop your own emergency kit. https://t.co/qy8U4snrDQ
